name: caab19f3-d176-4662-a0e2-42f369d547ff

text:
<speak><prosody rate=”x-slow”>I see a total bill of 
$$session.params.subscriber_summary_decimals.serviceSummary.serviceCharge.totalChargeAmt on your number for $sys.func.FORMAT_DATE($sys.func.GET($session.params.bill_dates, $session.params.bill_period), "MMMM dd, yyyy", "en").</prosody></speak>
<speak>You have usage charges of <prosody rate=”slow”>$$session.params.usage_charges.Data.usageSummaryChargeAmt</prosody> for data overedges on your invoice.</speak>
<speak>You have usage charges of <prosody rate=”slow”>$$session.params.usage_charges.Dataservices.usageSummaryChargeAmt</prosody> for data overages on your invoice.</speak>

<speak>You have usage charges of <prosody rate=”slow”>$$session.params.usage_summary_charges.LongDistanceUSInternationalVoiceUsage.totalChargeAmt</prosody> on your invoice for International long distance.</speak>
<speak>You have usage charges of <prosody rate=”slow”> $$session.params.usage_summary_charges.LongDistanceDomesticPhone.totalChargeAmt</prosody> on your invoice for Canadian long distance.</speak>
<speak>You have usage charges of <prosody rate=”slow”>$$session.params.usage_charges.Airtime.usageSummaryChargeAmt</prosody> for airtime usage on your invoice.</speak>
<speak>You have usage charges of <prosody rate=”slow”>$$session.params.usage_summary_charges.LocalAirtimePhoneminutes.totalChargeAmt</prosody> for local airtime usage on your invoice.</speak>

<speak>This line was recently activated, which resulted in a <prosody rate=”slow”>$$session.params.monthly_charges.ConnectionFee[2] </prosody> Connection Fee charge. A Connection Fee is applied on all activations and renewals completed in store or by an agent over the phone.</speak>

<speak>Your account was recently restored, which resulted in a <prosody rate=”slow”>$$session.params.monthly_charges.MobileReconnectionChrg[2]</prosody> Reconnection Fee charge on your invoice.</speak>

Currently, for the <say-as interpret-as="telephone" google:style='zero-as-zero'>$session.params.phone_number line</say-as>, you have $$session.params.bill_summary.billSummary.balanceForwardAmt forwarded to your current bill.
I can see you have partial charges on your invoice.
<speak><prosody rate=”x-slow”>You have $$session.params.partial_charges[0].chargeItemAmtTxt for $session.params.partial_charges[0].chargeItemDescriptionTxt on your invoice.</prosody></speak>

<speak><prosody rate=”x-slow”>These are the details of the charges: <break time="5s"/> $$session.params.partial_charges[0].chargeItemAmtTxt for $session.params.partial_charges[0].chargeItemDescriptionTxt, <break time="3s"/> $$session.params.partial_charges[1].chargeItemAmtTxt for $session.params.partial_charges[1].chargeItemDescriptionTxt </prosody></speak>

<speak><prosody rate=”x-slow”>These are the details of the charges: <break time="5s"/> $$session.params.partial_charges[0].chargeItemAmtTxt for $session.params.partial_charges[0].chargeItemDescriptionTxt ,<break time="3s"/> $$session.params.partial_charges[1].chargeItemAmtTxt for $session.params.partial_charges[1].chargeItemDescriptionTxt ,<break time="3s"/> $$session.params.partial_charges[2].chargeItemAmtTxt for $session.params.partial_charges[2].chargeItemDescriptionTxt .</prosody></speak>

<speak><prosody rate=”x-slow”>These are the details of the charges: <break time="5s"/> $$session.params.partial_charges[0].chargeItemAmtTxt for $session.params.partial_charges[0].chargeItemDescriptionTxt ,<break time="5s"/> $$session.params.partial_charges[1].chargeItemAmtTxt for $session.params.partial_charges[1].chargeItemDescriptionTxt ,<break time="5s"/> $$session.params.partial_charges[2].chargeItemAmtTxt for $session.params.partial_charges[2].chargeItemDescriptionTxt ,<break time="5s"/> $$session.params.partial_charges[3].chargeItemAmtTxt for $session.params.partial_charges[3].chargeItemDescriptionTxt.</prosody></speak>

<speak><prosody rate=”x-slow”>These are the details of the charges: <break time="5s"/> $$session.params.partial_charges[0].chargeItemAmtTxt for $session.params.partial_charges[0].chargeItemDescriptionTxt ,<break time="5s"/> $$session.params.partial_charges[1].chargeItemAmtTxt for $session.params.partial_charges[1].chargeItemDescriptionTxt ,<break time="5s"/> $$session.params.partial_charges[2].chargeItemAmtTxt for $session.params.partial_charges[2].chargeItemDescriptionTxt ,<break time="5s"/> $$session.params.partial_charges[3].chargeItemAmtTxt for $session.params.partial_charges[3].chargeItemDescriptionTxt ,<break time="5s"/> $$session.params.partial_charges[4].chargeItemAmtTxt for $session.params.partial_charges[4].chargeItemDescriptionTxt .</prosody></speak>

<speak><prosody rate=”x-slow”>These are the details of the charges: <break time="5s"/> $$session.params.partial_charges[0].chargeItemAmtTxt for $session.params.partial_charges[0].chargeItemDescriptionTxt ,<break time="5s"/> $$session.params.partial_charges[1].chargeItemAmtTxt for $session.params.partial_charges[1].chargeItemDescriptionTxt ,<break time="5s"/> $$session.params.partial_charges[2].chargeItemAmtTxt for $session.params.partial_charges[2].chargeItemDescriptionTxt ,<break time="5s"/> $$session.params.partial_charges[3].chargeItemAmtTxt for $session.params.partial_charges[3].chargeItemDescriptionTxt ,<break time="5s"/> $$session.params.partial_charges[4].chargeItemAmtTxt for $session.params.partial_charges[4].chargeItemDescriptionTxt ,<break time="5s"/> $$session.params.partial_charges[5].chargeItemAmtTxt for $session.params.partial_charges[5].chargeItemDescriptionTxt .</prosody></speak>
Do you want to know more about any of these charges?

description: This page will display the differences that are found along with the total amount
